Posts.Content: Hi everyone first time on here and just looking some advice our stories to lift my mums spirits! My mum has been told she has breast cancer she's having operation in the few weeks to remove breast she slowly has come to terms with this but now after having scans on her liver they have told us the liver scan was unclear and she is now waiting on a ct scan to c what this my be.. I no I shouldn't have but I googled what this my mean and now I'm so scared for my mum I'm a lonely child it's always been me And my mum and I'm so scared by what I read on this!! Is it true that if its spread to the liver it's not curable??? I don't understand cause my mums was caught very early her lumps in the breast were only millimetres and its not in her limths under her arms!! Any advice someone can give me would be so wonderful...
Posts.Title: For my mum!!

Posts.Content: Thank you for your fast reply ill def be on here over the coming weeks and months to vent and get some comfort and strength so I can keep my mums spirits up and not ever let her see me down!!! P.s I'm her son :)
Posts.Title: For my mum!!
